DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect ivabradine endothelial function patient coronary artery disease ( CAD ) complete revascularization percutaneous coronary angioplasty ( PCI ) . At least 30 day PCI , patient randomize receive ivabradine 5 mg twice daily continue standard medical therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Ivabradine Improve Endothelial Function Patients With Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.criteria: history stable coronary disease complete coronary revascularization PCI least 1 month prior recruitment sinus rhythm absence anginal symptom rest heart rate < 60 beat per minute severe reduction leave ventricle ejection fraction ( < 40 % ) coronary artery bypass surgery myocardial infarction , stroke cerebral transient ischemic attack within previous 6 month implant pacemaker , cardioverter , defibrillator sick sinus syndrome sinoatrial block congenital long QT complete atrioventricular block
